fel.cvut.af.model.options

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fel.cvut.af.model.options.Option<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of value, should be type that can be serialized as a JSON type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanOption, EntityOption, NumberOption, StringOption

    @Entity
public abstract class Option<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract predecessor for Option values defining all common attributes.

    This class is product of Data Transfer Object pattern (DTO). It encapsulates data that are about to be serialized as options for Selectboxes similar elements.
